item.title: Why Zerodha doesn't have a data team
item.description: How useful is collecting & analysing tons of data is a question I ask my peers. We have no data team at Zerodha as we believe it doesn’t give useful insights & also since we never upsell. Article & comments on this topic are interesting ðŸ˜¬
